lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because:
I AM LOOKING FOR A WORKING CAPITAL TO START SELLING COMPUTERS AND COMPUTER ACCESSORIES.

My name is Stephen I am 39 yrs old. Please save my family and don’t let us die of hunger and shame. I am a computer engineer based in Lagos, Nigeria I am looking for a working capital of $2,500 to be selling computers and computer accessories. This is what I knew doing best.  Nigeria has a larger market for computer and computer accessories. I knew where to buy the computers and good quality computer accessories at a very good price for Nigeria local market with a good reasonable profit.
lenders.occupational_info:
The business is purely buying and selling of computers and computer accessories and it is profitable and I am sure of paying back the loan within three (3) months. I am not gamble with the money I have many years working experience in computer business. I knew where to buy goods at a good price to resale here in Nigeria to give me good profit, I knew exactly what to buy and where to sale at wholesales. Not getting money to start this business is killing my dreams. Please help me for God sake.

Mode of shipment from where I buy the goods to Nigeria where I intend to sale is through courier services and it usually between 3 – 5 working days. I knew what to order that the weight will not be heavy so that I don’t spend too much money on shipment

I have experienced in this business. I knew what to buy and where to sale. I already know the selling price from where I will buy the goods before I order the goods and I also know the selling price here in Nigeria so there is no way I can loss. There secret of every successful business is to know where to buy goods at a cheap price and to know where to sale with a reasonable profit.

Please give me a chance to put my experiences of many years into use. Help me start my own business and put a smile in my family face. Save me and my family from hunger. I am sure of paying back the loan within 3 months. Please help me and let my dream come true in life. All your effort in life will not be in vain.

I had been suffering for many years because I do not have money to start buying goods to sale. Help me. All I wanted is to become an importer in selling computer and computer accessories. All I need to start this business is $2,500 I believe in starting small and grow big. I am 100 % sure that with a loan of $2,500 I can grow the business to a very big and successful business within some few months. Little drops of water make a mighty ocean.

If God torches your heart and you wish to help to put a smile in my face or go into partnership with me in this type of business kindly contact me on

Stephenmata@yahoo.com or +234 80 89341167

You will be glad you did. It is a very profitable business. There is no business like buying and selling. And the secret of every successful business is to know where to buy goods at a cheaper price and know where to sale to make a profit.

Stephen B. Smile
Stephenmata@yahoo.com

lenders.name: Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: microfinance is the way to help the developing world pull itself up from poverty.  No paternalism, no dependency-creating aid.  Microfinance merely channels funds from those who wish to help to those who know how to help themselves and need a loan to get there.  Kiva is brilliant for allowing you and me to donate our small savings directly and transparently to people on the other side of the world.

lenders.name: tikvadavaraninc
lenders.occupational_info:
Tikva Davaran Car Parts
Mercedes-Benz E-Class Comfort

In back, the seat has a high cushion so even taller folks have ample under-thigh support. Though the rear backrest looks flat, it's comfortable, while nearly 36 inches of rear legroom prove enough for a pair of 6-foot staffers riding front and rear.

Tikva Davaran
Audi TT Coupe 3.2 Quattro
Design/Fit and Finish

There's no criticism inside, where the highest-quality materials come together with peerless fit and finish. The woven headliner is nicer than most cars' upholstery. Our test car's red and black leather brings a nice touch of color to an otherwise typically austere German cabin.

Cars Blog Tikva Davaran : Test Drive: 2009 Acura RL Performance

The RL's handling is adequate and is significantly boosted by the Super Handling All-Wheel Drive (SH-AWD) system that transfers power from front to rear and side to side. The result is that even a Sunday-only driver can corner like a Touring Car champ. In hard cornering, the car feels big, although the steering is quick enough to feel sporty and the newly revised suspension is a better compromise between comfortable and sporty. Acura uses low-rolling-resistance tires, presumably to boost fuel economy, but the lack of grip takes away any teeth the all-wheel-drive system potentially adds. Braking also suffers — a stop from 60 mph takes up 131 feet of asphalt. By comparison, the less expensive Hyundai Genesis does it in 117 feet. Unlike the Acura TL, the RL feels as if it needs the SH-AWD just to keep its handling within acceptable limits; again, tires could be the culprit here.

lenders.occupational_info: Work testing system and equipment on ship.

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: this will equalize the unequal
lenders.occupational_info: Everyone's got their own talents and what they can contribute.  I'm just trying to find out what I can do that will fulfill that.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want you to succeed in realizing your dream!
lenders.occupational_info: I am the principal of a Kindergarten through 8th grade school of 537 students and 65 faculty in Evanston, Illinois, which is the very first suburb just north of Chicago.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I like to encourage entrepreneurship and I like to teach my children charity.
lenders.occupational_info: Our family owns a business that manages residential and commercial properties all over the United States.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the education and training of psychologists.

lenders.name: In Memory of Larua
lenders.loan_because: The monies used to fund these loans were received in memory of Laura Lenert.  She enjoyed helping others.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the golden rule

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: Giving is good...
lenders.occupational_info: A man of faith who sees the value of all individuals.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: to help other's

lenders.name: Eryn
lenders.loan_because: I love entrepreneurship, and I think international trade and financing is a critical part of making the world more connected and ultimately a better place for all of us to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a general manager for an online software company. We are focused on streamlining processes for insurance companies using the latest technology and business practices.

lenders.name: tricia
lenders.loan_because: I belive that Micro Financing is a wonderful way to offer opportunity to people to help themslves out of poverty, with that comes a wonderfully positive ripple effect to others in the communy as well as to their families. We together can raise the spirit & release the hardship of our neighbours, if we support Micro Financing.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband & I have a web site that we have set up in the hope of offering food education & freedom from poverty for many. we are currently working on 3 projects 1 in South Africa, 1 in Zambia & 1 in Fiji. We love what we are able to achive & belive that each person has a divine need to be generous of mind, spirit & to give back to those in need.

lenders.name: Helena
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who want to improve their circumstances.  I think that lending and repaying small loans is an excellent way to bridge cultures.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work on a study regarding psychology and cancer.  I explain our research study to people and ask them to participate.  I collect and analyze their responses and report to our funding agency.
I am a graduate student studying criminology, law, and society.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can

lenders.name: Michael Anthony
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves to be as happy as I am; everyone should enjoy a life as blessed as mine.
lenders.occupational_info: My ultimate goal is to give an empowering voice and a stage to my community, as well as those around the world.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people an opportunity to support themselves

lenders.name: elsa
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in Bolivia, and have a passion for supporting entrepreneurial spirit through community.

lenders.name: Yukari
lenders.loan_because:
The work brings to entrepreneneurs moneys, confidence, success, hope, educathion for kids, ...and more! 
I like that I can help someone as KIva Lender.
And I like, we can see face to face♪
Kivaを気に入った理由 ： ちょっとした意識が誰かの役に立つこと。ちょっとしたお金がたくさん集まると大きな力になること。そしてお互いの顔が見えること。
lenders.occupational_info:
I am married and has two children. I have knowledge of aromatherapy and technique of aromatreatment, reflexology.
I started  business. 
I can get not only the money but also many good things from my work. 
どんな種類でもどんな規模でも、ビジネスを続けることで得られるたくさんの幸せを、一人でも多くの起業家に感じてもらいたい。

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: We are born by chance, wherever we are born.

lenders.name: towerhill
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Johnik
lenders.loan_because: I am the student of the Kharkov university, study on requiring payment basis. For a year it is necessary to pay 450 dollars for studying. In a country where I live a world financial crisis so much showed up, therefore there were extraordinary financial expenses in whether for liquidation of academic debts . I ask to give me a sum 100$ for coverage of charges.
lenders.occupational_info: freelancer-photographer, student

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I was first bitten by the entrepreneurial bug as a teenager in high school and always knew that I'd have my own business.  As a parent, I appreciate the flexibility and freedom I have to work around the needs of my family and want to empower other women--especially those with fewer economic opportunities than I have had--to do the same.

lenders.name: Imke
lenders.loan_because: It is tremendously joyful to re- and respend the same money - baskets... on others!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in businesses to work together in the best efficient and effective way

lenders.name: Minigadgets.nl
lenders.loan_because: We would like to give everyone the opportunity to start up a new entreprise and we believe in entrepreneurship
lenders.occupational_info: We are an online retailstore located in the Netherlands. We sell gadgets and accessoires for mobile phones, mp3 players, laptops and gameconsoles in the Netherlands and Belgium.

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make the most of their life. What seems like so little to me can mean so much to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: someone ready to help

lenders.name: Arvid
lenders.loan_because: I'd rather want my money to help others than the international banking system. And I think it's a great way of helping others help themselves!

lenders.name: Isabel
lenders.loan_because: The ability to help is within my hands

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur for many years and respect anyone willing to take the risks and make the sacrifices necessary to improve their lives and the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Software development

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Manufacturing

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Ether
lenders.loan_because: life is more than just money.

lenders.name: Mirko
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute in changing the world to a better place by acting economically. I think that's more sustainable than giving free money (aka development aid) to governments.

lenders.name: Eelco Maljaars
lenders.loan_because: This website succeeds in giving me some sense of connection to the entrepreneurs I support.

lenders.name: Jacque
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to follow their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: photographer and recycler (www.ftri.net)

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to excell in their own respects. As those who wern't fortunate to have been born with all the freedoms as I; Thats why i give.
lenders.occupational_info: I can only hope that when a donation is made it is to someone who deserves it and uses it wisley.

lenders.name: Bonita
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others. I do not have much but I want to share what little I have with people who appreciate it. To see what a small amount of money can do for people from another country is wonderful and I am glad that I can be a part of that.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: it's worthwhile.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a seniors' retirement centre, distributing medications, doing physical assessments, doing wound care, and working with various other healthcare professionals.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: It is the most effective and efficient way for me to help those in need.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can use a helping hand, and offering that had when I can makes the world just that little bit better.

lenders.name: Dusty
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a way to empower individuals, improve the local economy, and bring us closer together in the world community.

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: It has meant a lot to me that other people have helped me when I needed it in the past.   It saddens me that so many people in our world are living in poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I connect manufacturing companies that build equipment with suppliers that make engineered metal components for their equipment.

lenders.name: Alina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are not as well off as I am. I am lucky to have what I do and I want others to be happy also. =)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Florida and will be teaching high school students.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: It seems to be a small way in which I can help those less fortunate than myself, without any religious leanings.  I also am happy to indulge my philanthropic tendencies without breaking my bank account.
lenders.occupational_info: I do a lot of paperwork for a Financial Advisor - forms, mailings and answering phones.  Customer service is a big part of what I do.  I also keep him on-schedule for meetings and appointments.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it is important to give back and I don't just mean to your local community but to the world.  It is time to change the world's opinion of the USA and eradicate the ethnocentrism that exists today.  I am actively involved with my companies philanthropic giving in the U.S. and Kiva is a great avenue to help people on a global level.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner at a small government consulting firm in the DC area.  We primarily assist with help projects to be delivered on time and within budget.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's a blessing to be able to share.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have written several plays about the women in Early America which I perform for historical sites, schools and other educational programs.  I'm a spinner, weaver and seamstress.  I make historically accurate clothing for my own use as well as museums, historical re-enactors and theatrical productions.  
I'm also a Minister in The Church of The Flying Spaghetti Monster and Coven leader of the Skywatchers Circle.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity for a life free from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide educational opportunities for college students outside of the classroom.
